posts.title: Pillowed Beach Towel
posts.content: Experience total comfort while you’re soaking up the rays by laying out on this pillowed beach towel. It comes with a removable contour pillow along with useful features like a water-resistant pocket and a touch screen pocket for your smartphone.

posts.title: Swan Cutlery Holder
posts.content: Maintain an elegant appearance at the dinner table while you entertain by setting out this lovely swan cutlery holder. Each stainless steel holder is crafted to look like a graceful swan and comes with four dessert forks and spoons.

posts.title: Sword Fly Swatter
posts.content: Silence those buzzing little bastards with ruthless efficiency by using this sword fly swatter. Available in one of three vibrant hues, it features a hilt-styled handle so you can grab and swing it like a sword when hunting down any small insect.

posts.title: Emergency Hand Crank Flashlight
posts.content: Maintain visibility even when the power goes out with help from this emergency hand crank flashlight. This ultra-useful device requires absolutely no batteries and can produce around an hour’s worth of lighting with only six minutes of cranking.

posts.title: Glow In The Dark Duct Tape
posts.content: Go to the next level with your various duct tape projects with the glow in the dark duct tape. Whether you are making yourself a duct tape dress, wallet, boat, house, or even a duct tape time machine – all of your projects will look that much cooler when they glow in the dark.

posts.title: Basketball Shot Tracker/Trainer
posts.content: Perfect your jumpshot by practicing using the basketball shot tracker/trainer. The trainer includes a net sensor and wrist sensor that track shot attempts, makes, and misses so that you can easily view the stats on your smartphone.

posts.title: 3D Spider-Man Hand Night Light
posts.content: Let the friendly neighborhood web-slinger keep the night goblins away with the 3D Spider-Man hand night light. Good ol’ Petey has broken through the walls to shoot his sticky web of light at any night time monster lurking in the dark corners of the room.

posts.title: App Controlled Garage Door Opener
posts.content: Open and close your garage door from anywhere using this app controlled garage door opener. It can be integrated onto your existing IP camera and provide you with updates and alerts in case your door is ever opened when you’re not home.

posts.title: LED Bulb Speaker
posts.content: Give any room in your humble abode a delightful soundtrack using this LED bulb speaker. This Bluetooth enabled bulb is compatible with both iOS and Android operating systems and comes with a built-in speaker that’ll deliver crisp sound to the entire room.

posts.title: Beer Head Foam Making Mug
posts.content: If you enjoy a frothy crown of head on your beer, this beer head foam making mug will be your new best friend. With the click of a button, this fun beer mug will add a rich bubbly foam to crown your beer – the longer you hold the button down the more head you get.

posts.title: Moby Dick Party Picks
posts.content: When there’s a shindig on the horizon, count on the Moby Dick party picks to make a splash among your guests. What better way to harpoon those delicious cheese cubes and party snacks than with pint sized water spout picks straight out of the whale’s blowhole.

posts.title: Unicorn Sprinkles Shaker
posts.content: Sprinkle some <del>cavity causing</del> magic onto your munchies and give them that mythical touch for extra flavor and aesthetics. Each magical unicorn comes with a vibrant rainbow mane and offers a fun way to add the perfect garnish to your sugary treats.
